name: Perpetual West Inc.
overview:
Perpetual West Inc. is a Canadian consulting company that provides cloud computing solutions and services to small and medium sized businesses.

Our services include cloud strategy, cloud implementation, custom cloud application development, cloud solutions review, and training. Perpetual West Inc. serves the SMB market through the delivery of high quality information technology solutions to address pain points that businesses struggle with. We want to come alongside businesses, understand their workflow, help them refine their processes and provide cloud computing solutions that fit their needs now and in the future.

We are a Salesforce.com Silver Cloud Alliance Partner, Google Apps Authorized Reseller, and a RingCentral Authorized Dealer.
